Network connections to domains exhibitin.Action: Analyze Zeek dns.log for unusual DNS query patterns (e.g., sudden query volume spikes to new domains, queries for domains with recent registration changes if external intel is available). Correlate with Zeek conn.log to identify internal hosts communicating with these domains. Use correlation analysis to identify hosts communicating with multiple newly observed or suspicious domains.

Connections to external infrastructure d.Action: Scan Zeek conn.log and Zeek ssl.log for connections to external IP addresses and ports matching known C2 patterns or indicators from threat intelligence feeds. Use correlation analysis to identify internal hosts connecting to multiple suspect external C2 IPs/domains. Identify unique SSL certificates observed in Zeek ssl.log for connections to suspect IPs and cross-reference against known malicious certificates.
